meanings.sent1: She reprograms her alarm clock every night before bed.
meanings.sent2: The technician reprograms the computer to fix the error.
meanings.sent3: The robot reprograms itself to wake up early and make breakfast, much to the surprise of its owner.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude reprograms his mind to see challenges as opportunities for growth.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reprograms the students' understanding of math by using fun games and activities.

meanings.definition: To change the programming of a device or system.
meanings.sent1: He reprograms the settings on his phone to save battery life.
meanings.sent2: The hacker reprograms the security system to grant unauthorized access.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat reprograms the automatic feeder to dispense treats all day long.
meanings.sent4: The new software update reprograms the smart thermostat for improved energy efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The scientist reprograms the robot's behavior to respond to voice commands more accurately.
